name: American Gangster
storyline: Set in the Harlem of the 70's, American Gangster: The Mobile Game takes players deep into the film's vice-laden setting as players either work their way up the ladder of the underworld as Frank Lucas or try to take down the crime empire as outcast cop, Richie Roberts
